item.title: Path following
item.description: Problem You want a character to follow a pre-defined path, such as a guard patrolling or an Solution There are many ways to approach this problem. In this solution, we’ll use Godot’s Path2D node (or Path for 3D) as a convenient way to draw paths in the editor. You can add the Path2D as a child of your main scene, your map, or another location that makes sense. Don’t make it a child of the patrolling entity, though - or the path will move along with the player!
